generalRules.title: Age Requirement
generalRules.description: Clients must be 21 years or older with valid ID

generalRules.title: Professional Service Only
generalRules.description: Our companions provide professional social accompaniment services only

generalRules.title: Cancellation Policy
generalRules.description: 24 hours notice required for cancellation to receive refund

bookingProcess.title: Select Companion
bookingProcess.description: Browse our verified companions and select your preferred match

bookingProcess.title: Fill Booking Form
bookingProcess.description: Complete the booking form with event details and personal information

bookingProcess.title: WhatsApp Confirmation
bookingProcess.description: Receive booking confirmation and payment instructions via WhatsApp

bookingProcess.title: Payment
bookingProcess.description: Complete payment to secure your booking

bookingProcess.title: Final Confirmation
bookingProcess.description: Receive final confirmation with companion contact details
